channel.title: MOTW-1890 London - Mythos (Series 1, June)
channel.description:
MOTW-1890 London - Mythos (Series 1, June) [Monster of the Week set in 1890 London involving deities, creatures, lore and items from Cthulhu Mythos stories] • Start with 3 Luck. • No Professional or Spell Slinger playbooks. • Each character has Alternative magic type from More Weirdness/Tome of Mysteries.
1- https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4VyQMPZRf_d2-ul2mv 2- https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4VygkBa2bPhad_b4ZI 3- https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4VynlMQMjTdqo6odCE

item.description:
@BlakeRyan wrote:

MOTW-1890 London - Mythos (Series 1, June)
[Monster of the Week set in 1890 London involving deities, creatures, lore and items from Cthulhu Mythos stories]
• Start with 3 Luck.
• No Professional or Spell Slinger playbooks.
• Each character has Alternative magic type from More Weirdness/Tome of Mysteries.
